title: Light Induced Quinone Conformation of Polymer Donors toward 19.9% Efficiency Organic Solar Cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00605D, Paper
Chuanhang Guo, Yuandong Sun, Liang Wang, Chenhao Liu, Chen Chen, Jingchao Cheng, Weiyi Xia, Zirui Gan, Jing Zhou, Zhenghong Chen, Jinpeng Zhou, Dan Liu, Jingxing Guo, Wei Li, Tao Wang
Modulating the self-assembly process of polymer donors is crucial to acquire ideal morphology of the photoactive layer for efficient photovoltaics, however, this always requires complicated chemical synthesis or comprehensive physical...
